revised_title: Radio Caustics and Cusps in the Ionosphere: A Study of Electromagnetic Waves
tldr: This article explores the behavior of radio signals in the ionosphere, focusing on the formation of caustic surfaces and cusp lines where there is some focusing. The author presents a method to calculate the spatial dependence of the field near these caustics and cusps using the angular spectrum of plane waves and the method of double steepest descents with two complex variables. The study is applicable to radio signals from point sources entering a horizontally stratified ionosphere.
